subject: Commercial use of Junit - license issues
msgSnippet: I am interested in using Junit internally (not for distribution) at my company for some product testing. However, our open source office is very concerned

I am interested in using Junit internally (not for distribution) at my 
com=
pany for some product testing. However, our open source office is 
very con=
cerned about the IBM Common Public License and its 
applicability to  users=
 and distributors of Junit and possible patent 
infringements. 

Can anyone=
 comment on this concern ? If Kent or Erich are listening, 
can Junit by li=
censed under an alternate open-source or  
commercial license ?



Chris Ch=
aulk
